entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
